subtitle:
After the chicken has marinated, this is a very quick all-in-one dish.
If using frozen chicken do make sure it is thawed first.

method.text: Mix chicken strips in with the pineapple juice and garlic. Cover and leave to marinate in the fridge for 1 hour, stirring occasionally.
Heat oil in a large frying pan or wok. Add the corn, carrots and plantain slices and fry over a medium heat for 3-5 min or until tender and golden.

Remove chicken from marinade, add to pan and stir-fry for 3-5 min or until golden brown. Finally, add the pepper, green and broad beans to the pan along with the remaining marinade and seasoning and stir-fry for 3 min to warm through.
Transfer to a warmed serving dish, garnish with chopped parsley. Serve immediately.

title: Caribbean chicken and fruit stir-fry
